title: Exercise 3-7
description: The area under the histogram between −120 and 10 is

questions.name: histogram_area
questions.title: The area under the histogram between −120 and 10 is (Enter as a percentage)

validators.text: Please enter a value between 79% and 79.2%.

questions.description: The answer is 79.1%. Just type the endpoints into the boxes in the histogram tool.
